mapper.select: SELECT 'EMPLOYEE_ID ' EMPLOYEE_ID , 'FIRST_NAME ' FIRST_NAME , 'LAST_NAME ' LAST_NAME , 'EMAIL ' EMAIL , 'PHONE_NUMBER ' PHONE_NUMBER , 'HIRE_DATE ' HIRE_DATE , 'JOB_ID ' JOB_ID , 'SALARY ' SALARY , 'COMMISSION_PCT' COMMISSION_PCT , 'MANAGER_ID ' MANAGER_ID , 'DEPARTMENT_ID ' DEPARTMENT_ID FROM DUAL
